short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper tool for getting Notion authentication token

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make Notion Plus Auth Helper is a user-friendly Chrome extension that simplifies the setup process when connecting Make (formerly Integromat) with Notion Plus. This helpful tool makes it easy to find and copy the required authentication credentials without any technical knowledge.

Key Features:
- Simple interface to view your Notion Plus authentication details
- Secure display of necessary connection credentials
- Safe mask/unmask options for sensitive information
- Quick copy buttons for easy setup in Make
- Clear display of token expiration dates
- Step-by-step guidance for Make configuration

Perfect for:
• Make automation users
• Business automation enthusiasts
• Team workflow managers

This extension takes the complexity out of connecting Make with Notion Plus by automatically locating and displaying the required authentication information. No technical expertise needed - just install, click, and copy the credentials into your Make configuration.

Note: This extension only requires access to notion.so domains to help you find your connection credentials. All information stays on your device and is never sent anywhere else.
